attributes.title: Story Arc One Recap
attributes.caption: Four misfits - Gellie, Hagan, Taylee, and Verity - team up and embark on a journey to save the town of Phandalin. Relive the first story arc and get yourself up to speed on the Role Initiative campaign before you check out story arc two!
attributes.description: Four misfits - Gellie, Hagan, Taylee, and Verity - team up and embark on a journey to save the town of Phandalin. Relive the first story arc and get yourself up to speed on the Role Initiative campaign before you check out story arc two!
attributes.display_title: Story Arc One Recap

attributes.title: Hit the Road - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: Our team sets off towards the Anauroch desert. They have a run in with some interesting new wagons.
attributes.description: Our team sets off towards the Anauroch desert. They have a run in with some interesting new wagons.
attributes.display_title: Hit the Road - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: Anauroch n’ Roll - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: The party starts their journey into the Anauroch desert in pursuit of the Blue Devil that kidnapped Dosh Wanga.
attributes.description: The party starts their journey into the Anauroch desert in pursuit of the Blue Devil that kidnapped Dosh Wanga.
attributes.display_title: Anauroch n’ Roll - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: Training Wheels - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: Cypher invites the team to his garage and lets them take the vehicles for a spin.
attributes.description: Cypher invites the team to his garage and lets them take the vehicles for a spin.
attributes.display_title: Training Wheels - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: We Gotta Go - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: The Demo Gobs have tracked the party to Wishariver and they are NOT happy.
attributes.description: The Demo Gobs have tracked the party to Wishariver and they are NOT happy.
attributes.display_title: We Gotta Go - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: Bumpy Road - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: Forced to flee Wishariver the gang dash across the desert with the Demo Gobs in hot pursuit.
attributes.description: Forced to flee Wishariver the gang dash across the desert with the Demo Gobs in hot pursuit.
attributes.display_title: Bumpy Road - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: Blood Canyon Actual - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: The team arrive at the Guilded Glove outpost where Hagan's reunion with Lucian reaches a boiling point.
attributes.description: The team arrive at the Guilded Glove outpost where Hagan's reunion with Lucian reaches a boiling point.
attributes.display_title: Blood Canyon Actual - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: Infernal Combustion - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: A sinister truth is learned about the war machines.
attributes.description: A sinister truth is learned about the war machines.
attributes.display_title: Infernal Combustion - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: A Night of Fire - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: Exhausted, and still a little tipsy, the party counters a demo goblin ambush.
attributes.description: Exhausted, and still a little tipsy, the party counters a demo goblin ambush.
attributes.display_title: A Night of Fire - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: The Gauntlet - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: Combat with the demogobs takes a turn as a gauntlet is thrown.
attributes.description: Combat with the demogobs takes a turn as a gauntlet is thrown.
attributes.display_title: The Gauntlet - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: Pumpkin Patch Panic - Spooky Special
attributes.caption: A very spooky Halloween special!
attributes.description: A very spooky Halloween special!
attributes.display_title: Pumpkin Patch Panic - Spooky Special

attributes.title: Rough Landing - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: The crew whips back into reality and takes anunscheduled pit stop in the middle of the Gauntlet.
attributes.description: The crew whips back into reality and takes anunscheduled pit stop in the middle of the Gauntlet.
attributes.display_title: Rough Landing - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: A Forest of Lies - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: Taylee fights through the final stretch of the Gauntlet.
attributes.description: Taylee fights through the final stretch of the Gauntlet.
attributes.display_title: A Forest of Lies - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: Say Hello to Consequences - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: Hagan calls in a favor.
attributes.description: Hagan calls in a favor.
attributes.display_title: Say Hello to Consequences - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: Outlaws of the Oaisis - Line in the Sand
attributes.caption: Trying to rest for a moment, the party can’t seem to catch a break.
attributes.description: Trying to rest for a moment, the party can’t seem to catch a break.
attributes.display_title: Outlaws of the Oaisis - Line in the Sand

attributes.title: Sweet Dreams - Winter Special
attributes.caption: A sugar-coated holiday special!
attributes.description: A sugar-coated holiday special!
attributes.display_title: Sweet Dreams - Winter Special

attributes.title: Merry Mismanagement - Winter Special
attributes.caption: The party takes some time to reflect on their adventures.
attributes.description: The party takes some time to reflect on their adventures.
attributes.display_title: Merry Mismanagement - Winter Special

attributes.title: A City of Devils
attributes.caption: The party immediately finds themselves in trouble when arriving at the devil city, Kudu.
attributes.description: The party immediately finds themselves in trouble when arriving at the devil city, Kudu.
attributes.display_title: A City of Devils

attributes.title: Dude Where's My Camel?
attributes.caption: Try their best to escape the green devil bar, the gang finds more questions than answers.
attributes.description: Try their best to escape the green devil bar, the gang finds more questions than answers.
attributes.display_title: Dude Where's My Camel?

attributes.title: Big Booms in the Broken Brewery
attributes.caption: As Hagan's family inheritance is in jeopardy, the party crosses paths with a barbaric new friend.
attributes.description: As Hagan's family inheritance is in jeopardy, the party crosses paths with a barbaric new friend.
attributes.display_title: Big Booms in the Broken Brewery

attributes.title: Don't Fear the Repo
attributes.caption: The party follows a lead to retrieve their stolen truck from the green devils.
attributes.description: The party follows a lead to retrieve their stolen truck from the green devils.
attributes.display_title: Don't Fear the Repo

attributes.title: The Lion, the Warehouse, and the Warlock
attributes.caption: A kidnapped truck, a new friend Rion, and a flood of information.
attributes.description: A kidnapped truck, a new friend Rion, and a flood of information.
attributes.display_title: The Lion, the Warehouse, and the Warlock

attributes.title: A Long Way Down
attributes.caption: Things are heating up in the undercity of Kudu. As the party falls deeper into trouble, can they find a way out?
attributes.description: Things are heating up in the undercity of Kudu. As the party falls deeper into trouble, can they find a way out?
attributes.display_title: A Long Way Down

attributes.title: Hot Headed into Danger
attributes.caption: Kudu is in turmoil! Qira clashes with the fire mage as the party struggles to save the city.
attributes.description: Kudu is in turmoil! Qira clashes with the fire mage as the party struggles to save the city.
attributes.display_title: Hot Headed into Danger

attributes.title: Gravity of the Situation
attributes.caption: A dark secret of the city is revealed as Luke and the fire mage go in for the kill.
attributes.description: A dark secret of the city is revealed as Luke and the fire mage go in for the kill.
attributes.display_title: Gravity of the Situation

attributes.title: Ghosts in the Machine
attributes.caption: Verity’s been kidnapped! The party tries to give chase, but is delayed by a sinister force with its own agenda.
attributes.description: Verity’s been kidnapped! The party tries to give chase, but is delayed by a sinister force with its own agenda.
attributes.display_title: Ghosts in the Machine
